lore: Most Ice Salamanders live in the Frostbite Caverns. When they cannot find a hollow space in the ice in which to lay their eggs, they periodically freeze the rock with their powerful breath to help them develop successfully. When these creatures reach maturity, they leave behind a slippery trail of solid ice. Sometimes, many young Ice Salamanders can be seen following an adult one, sliding merrily on the frozen ground.
menagerieDialog: (Your magical items grow warmer in its presence.)
(It just bit off its own tail. It'll grow back though, right?)
(It blinks immediately after you do. Every. Single. Time.)
(This creature is licking everything in sight. Even the floor, which is home to some unsavory presents after such a long journey.)
(Its severed tail is laying next to it. Fear not - it will grow back soon enough.)
name: Ice Salamander
